item.title: Catching Up
item.description: Trying to Remember What I’ve Done After looking over the code where I left it a few months ago it’s not in a super horrible state. Much of what I’ve done to this point was getting a game mechanic to work and then quickly moving on to the next task. This left a lot of sloppy and hacked together code. In most other projects that is typically where I’ll leave it, but for this project I’d like to clean things up some.
